name: Throw Balls at Ragdolls
description:
Throw balls at ragdolls and if that doesn't work stand on top of them and then throw. If you get a combo or get a good angle they can go flying. You can also glitch them through walls so that's cool I guess.

Hey it would be fun if you played this while listening to opera music

Why are you playing this tho fr...

It's technically a simulation I guess?
